Sentencas: To improve the sluggish kinetics of oxygen electrode reactions in reversible solid oxide cells (RSOCs), a novel layered structure Nd0.1Ca0.1Ba1.8Co9O14 (NCBCO) having alternating perovskite and CdI2-based layers is introduced in this field for the first time as a highly active and durable catalyst.
Titulo: Layered barium cobaltite structure materials containing perovskite and CdI2-based layers for reversible solid oxide cells with exceptionally high performance

Sentencas: Maximum power densities of NCBCO with zirconia-based cells are high, reaching 2.6 W.cm(-2) at 800 ?
Titulo: Layered barium cobaltite structure materials containing perovskite and CdI2-based layers for reversible solid oxide cells with exceptionally high performance

Sentencas: in solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) mode.
Titulo: Layered barium cobaltite structure materials containing perovskite and CdI2-based layers for reversible solid oxide cells with exceptionally high performance

Sentencas: Under a solid oxide electrolysis cell (SOEC) mode, the zirconia-based cell with NCBCO achieves an outstanding current density of -4.36 A.cm(-2) at 800 ?
Titulo: Layered barium cobaltite structure materials containing perovskite and CdI2-based layers for reversible solid oxide cells with exceptionally high performance

Sentencas: with an applied voltage of 1.6 V, surpassing many results of the reported oxygen evolution reaction catalysts with the high activities.
Titulo: Layered barium cobaltite structure materials containing perovskite and CdI2-based layers for reversible solid oxide cells with exceptionally high performance

Sentencas: Furthermore, RSOCs with NCBCO presents no degradation over entire 400 h in SOFC and SOEC modes.
Titulo: Layered barium cobaltite structure materials containing perovskite and CdI2-based layers for reversible solid oxide cells with exceptionally high performance

Sentencas: Such outstanding electrocatalytic performances of NCBCO for oxygen electrode reactions might be attributed to its high oxygen vacancy content with a high electrical conductivity.
Titulo: Layered barium cobaltite structure materials containing perovskite and CdI2-based layers for reversible solid oxide cells with exceptionally high performance

Sentencas: This is confirmed by X-ray absorption spectroscopy, X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy, temperature-programmed desorption of oxygen, and electron paramagnetic resonance measurements.
Titulo: Layered barium cobaltite structure materials containing perovskite and CdI2-based layers for reversible solid oxide cells with exceptionally high performance

Sentencas: These results validate that the layered structure NCBCO can be a potential oxygen electrode material for RSOCs.
Titulo: Layered barium cobaltite structure materials containing perovskite and CdI2-based layers for reversible solid oxide cells with exceptionally high performance
